channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens AG -- Desigo CC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens AG -- Desigo CC

item.title: CVE-2020-10055|2024-08-04T10:50:57.784Z -- siemens%20ag -- desigo%20cc
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Desigo CC (V4.x), Desigo CC (V3.x), Desigo CC Compact (V4.x), Desigo CC Compact (V3.x). Affected applications are delivered with a 3rd party component (BIRT) that contains a remote code execution vulnerability if the Advanced Reporting Engine is enabled. The vulnerability could allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the server with SYSTEM privileges.
